letters.description: Evaluate the dog's current diet, health history, breed-specific needs, and lifestyle to establish a baseline.
Determine the dog's specific nutritional requirements based on age, activity level, health conditions, and individual sensitivities.
Create a customized feeding plan incorporating whole foods and targeted supplements to address identified needs and promote optimal health.
Implement the nutrition plan and closely monitor the dog's response, adjusting as needed based on observed changes in health and behavior.
Provide ongoing support and education to the owner to ensure long-term adherence to the plan and empower them to make informed nutritional choices.
